website_summaries.verdict: A mini cookie cutter set with an assortment of traditional shapes in varying sizes. Ideal for miniature cookies, bite-size desserts, or intricate baking decorations.
pros: Sturdy food grade stainless steel construction is dishwasher safe and rust resistant
Oven safe up to 500° F. Offers a total of eight popular shapes in 3 different sizes
Comes with a handy storage container
cons: Storage tin can be difficult to open and close

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I gave these a 4 star instead of 5 just because there are a few that do not line up perfectly at the seam. It is actually better to flip it upside down and cut with the top of the cutter on those few. But they are definitely worth the price. I would buy them again since it is such a small flaw and it is avoidable.
customer_reviews.author: Amber O.

customer_reviews.title: Very very small
customer_reviews.text: They’re much tinier than I imagined, and I think because of that the cuts/lines weren’t as clean as I would have liked, but I only needed one of the cutters and I was able to get the cake made with it.
customer_reviews.author: Pika95smh

customer_reviews.title: perfect for cutting fondant
customer_reviews.text: Love these cutters! I needed a hexagon shape so I could cut a ton of diamonds out of fondant. This set had the perfect size! Very sturdy metal. I can't wait to use the rest of the cutters.
customer_reviews.author: Neena

customer_reviews.title: cookie cutters
customer_reviews.text: These cutters are very useful. I needed something different for tiny sandwiches for a card party. These did the trick for cutting the breads. Another day they were used for cutting cookies. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brownie

customer_reviews.title: just 1 issue
customer_reviews.text: Good product but if you plan on carrying them around in the container for get it. Once open the container does not close. Other then that its fine. It is what it says
customer_reviews.author: Rose D.

customer_reviews.title: So happy with the product!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They're perfect to make any handmade craft with Polymer Clay.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Cute and perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for making mini cookies. If you sell cookies, these are a big help as people find the cookies so cute. Also I'm aware these cookies don't have 100% perfect edges but that is on me because I was impatient and didn't chill the cookie dough before baking. These cookie cutters do exactly what they're supposed to do :) For a great price and decent amount. Easy to clean too! Let it soak before washing if you have to.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tiny size
customer_reviews.text: These tiny "cookie" cutters are great for linzer cookies and pie crusts.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah P.

customer_reviews.title: Kinda small
customer_reviews.text: Work fine but smaller than I expected the biggest one is smaller than a pepperoni
customer_reviews.author: Angelica Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Too small.
customer_reviews.text: So so so small. Pretty much useless for cookies. Maybe good for fondant decorations but for cookies even the largest sizes of the shapes are about bite-sized.
customer_reviews.author: L.horn

customer_reviews.title: user friendly
customer_reviews.text: a lot smaller than I thought. they will work but not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Herniman

customer_reviews.title: Great product and price
customer_reviews.text: They came in a tiny tin (of course these are tiny lol). Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Great for my intended use
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for to make fun shapes for my toddlers food. I imagine they would be on the small side for traditional cookies but they’re perfect bite size cut outs for sandwiches, veggies, etc.
customer_reviews.author: chelsea

customer_reviews.title: polymer clay jewelry making
customer_reviews.text: I used these to cut out my clay earrings and they were amazing for that use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Pilkington

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE!
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality workman ship! I use the cutters to make jewelry, art items and crafts. The cutters cut easily and cleanly.
customer_reviews.author: redhead

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to make lunches cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to cut out foods for my sons lunch box. They work perfectly cutting up pepperoni and cucumbers and other veggies. It makes his lunch cute and sometimes helps me to get him to try new foods.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: The cutters are sturdy and perfect thickness. I like that they come in a little tin container to keep it organized. Cute shapes too!
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela Davila

customer_reviews.title: Too small!
customer_reviews.text: Too small!! The square shape is a bit off.quality ok not the best
customer_reviews.author: Nadia

customer_reviews.title: No issues here
customer_reviews.text: It did what I wanted it to do,,I used it with polymer clay and everything is with me
customer_reviews.author: Rene

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: These are as described and the smallest ones are the perfectnsize for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice kit
customer_reviews.text: I just got it. Haven't had a chance to use it, but meet my expectations in terms of what I saw in the picture before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Mayda A. Nazario Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, I will be using them for Polymer Clay Jewelry Making
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Works great with polymer clay!
customer_reviews.author: Amorette

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !
customer_reviews.text: They are so practical, perfect mini cutters. They are just as described and come in a storage tin
customer_reviews.author: Karina H

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Received this product quickly and works like a charm for all my polymer clay projects.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Truly mini & excellent product
customer_reviews.text: There are 3 different sizes of each shape in the nifty little tin. Note the little stars on the tops of the mini-tarts...that’s the medium star cutter @ 1 1/4 inches. They are absolutely simple to clean. I have given the only 4 stars for durability as I’ve only had them for a week! Overall: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: E. flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy box and inconsistent shape variety sizes
customer_reviews.text: The box was so flimsy I couldn't get it closed after the first time I opened it and the cutters came with a good variety in shapes but the sizes were very inconsistent for example the smallest of one shape was the same size as the medium of another... I can't say I'm disappointed because the price was pretty fair for the quality
customer_reviews.author: jennifer garcia

customer_reviews.title: Oxidize, the sides are different from other.
customer_reviews.text: I loved them when a saw the package, they looked so cute, but when I started using them, I realized that the geometric shapes: Triangles, hexagons, squares are not exact, each side is different from the other. They also oxidize, bad quality. I washed them (hand, soft soap and sponge) and let them drain and then dry with a cloth. In a few days I figured out that the color have changed and have got some stains.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Great clay cutters!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my polymer clay. They’re really easy to use and now I get to do so many versatile designs with my earrings. This is the best value for clay cutters. Buying one set of one shape at a time is going to cost more. This set offers you so many shapes already.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy V.

customer_reviews.title: Metal seam too noticeable
customer_reviews.text: Every single cutter has an overlap seam that leaves a dent in my clay. If I use these I have to try to reshape that area before baking or sand that area after. I don’t use them because they create more work for me. I’m using plastic cutters instead
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O

customer_reviews.title: Great cutter for art!
customer_reviews.text: I did not buy this for baking, but I bet it works very well for that. I use these cutters in my art work. They are really good doe making stencils. They are worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: These are tiny- just what I was looking for. The only downside is putting all of them back in the storage time, it's kind of a puzzle to get them all in.
customer_reviews.author: Ida W.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My little ones are having so much fun cutting out shapes from their modeling clay. The shapes are little, but so are the hands of the children.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value. Well made. I've had no problems with the quality or being able to fit them back in the container... It doesn't take a rocket scientist to match shapes and sizes. Everything fits fine. Nice and tidy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little cutters
customer_reviews.text: These are nice little cutters. I plan on using them with polymer clay. I really like the size gradation, and the price was great.
customer_reviews.author: B. Angry

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and exactly what I thought they would be. They came in a small round box to store them in. Slightly difficult to clean due to small size and angles but not too bad. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa M

customer_reviews.title: Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: Such a good deal! these make cute stacked cookies and the different sizes mean that I have plenty of choices. I can't wait for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel H.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The metal container that housed the cutters was badly bent upon receipt.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Ruth DeLurey

product_meta.title: Homy Feel Mini Geometric Shaped Cookie Biscuit Cutter Set 24 Hexagon Square Heart Triangle Round Tiny Circle Baking Stainless Steel Metal Molds
product_meta.description:
MADE OF STEEL
The Homy Feel circle shape cutters kit is made of 430 stainless steel making them strong so they keep their shape, are rust proof, dishwasher safe and tested to be oven safe to 500F degrees. 

PROFESSIONAL DESIGN
Fully stainless steel Rolled top edges, to protects your fingers during the cutting process. The donuts cutter set has no sharp dangerous seams, and a plain clean edge on the bottom to cut with ease. 

MANY SIZES
Biscuit Cutter Set 24 various graduated sizes,Ring Diameters: 0.7-1.88 to 0.3-1.88 inches.Nested neatly in a compact sturdy storage tin. 

MULTIPURPOSE
Biscuit Cutter Set is widely used: including cutting cookies, pastries, dough, fondant, empanadas,crumpets, tarts, canapes,doughnuts, vegetables, English muffins, bread, ravioli pasta.Use it for baking, cooking, frying eggs or making pancakes. 

The Homy Feel Biscuit Cutter set has a good design package, convenient storage, and make it a perfect gift for any occasion.
feature_bullets: The Homy Feel small cookie cutter kit is made of 430 stainless steel making them strong so they keep their shape, are rust proof, dishwasher safe and tested to be oven safe to 500F degrees.
Fully stainless steel Rolled top edges, to protects your fingers during the cutting process. The cutter set has no sharp dangerous seams, and a plain clean edge on the bottom to cut with ease.

Biscuit Cutter Set 24 various graduated sizes,Ring Diameters: 0.7-1.88 to 0.3-1.88 inches.Nested neatly in a compact sturdy storage tin.The biscuit mold belongs to the mini size,very small, please refer to the picture explanation.

Biscuit Cutter Set is widely used: including cutting cookies, pastries, dough, fondant, empanadas,crumpets, tarts, canapes,doughnuts, vegetables, English muffins, bread, ravioli pasta . Use it for baking, cooking, frying eggs or making pancakes.
The Homy Feel Biscuit Cutter set has a good design package, convenient storage, and make it a perfect gift for any occasion.
